title: 90j4q
author: 90j4q
content: I'm currently conducting research on decision psychology, particularly focusing on probability assessment in financial contexts. As part of my research, I'm interested in gathering insights from a diverse group of individuals, and I view this subreddit as a community of experts whose opinions would be invaluable.I'd like to pose the following question for discussion:What is the likelihood that the BTC-CHF exchange rate next week (Sunday 6 pm) will be higher than the rate of the current week (Sunday 6 pm)?When assessing this probability, I'm looking for cues and factors that you believe are significant in making such predictions.Feel free to provide your thoughts, opinions, and any other relevant information that could help in assessing the probability of the BTC-CHF exchange rate for the upcoming week. Your contributions will greatly contribute to my research, and I appreciate your participation!Looking forward to an insightful discussion.Thank you!
